languages.text: "Нужен иной повод, кроме выживания и амбиций? Комморра не терпит слабых. Комморра уважает лишь силу и хитрость. Ты либо идешь вверх по трупам своих врагов, либо становишься одной из ступенек".

"Must there be another reason beyond survival and ambition? Commorragh does not tolerate weakness. Commorragh respects only strength and cunning. Either you climb upward on the corpses of your enemies, or you become one of the steps underfoot."
languages.original_text: "Нужен иной повод, кроме выживания и амбиций? Комморра не терпит слабых. Комморра уважает лишь силу и хитрость. Ты либо идешь вверх по трупам своих врагов, либо становишься одной из ступенек".

traits.locale_text: "Must there be another reason beyond survival and ambition? Commorragh does not tolerate weakness. Commorragh respects only strength and cunning. Either you climb upward on the corpses of your enemies, or you become one of the steps underfoot."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Must there be another reason beyond survival and ambition? Commorragh does not tolerate weakness. Commorragh respects only strength and cunning. Either you climb upward on the corpses of your enemies, or you become one of the steps underfoot."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Must there be another reason beyond survival and ambition? Commorragh does not tolerate weakness. Commorragh respects only strength and cunning. Either you climb upward on the corpses of your enemies, or you become one of the steps underfoot."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Must there be another reason beyond survival and ambition? Commorragh does not tolerate weakness. Commorragh respects only strength and cunning. Either you climb upward on the corpses of your enemies, or you become one of the steps underfoot."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿Hace falta otra razón más allá de la supervivencia y la ambición? Commorragh no tolera la debilidad. Solo respeta la fuerza y la astucia. O escalas hacia la cima sobre los cadáveres de tus enemigos o te conviertes en un peldaño más para otra persona».
languages.original_text: "Must there be another reason beyond survival and ambition? Commorragh does not tolerate weakness. Commorragh respects only strength and cunning. Either you climb upward on the corpses of your enemies, or you become one of the steps underfoot."

traits.locale_text: «¿Hace falta otra razón más allá de la supervivencia y la ambición? Commorragh no tolera la debilidad. Solo respeta la fuerza y la astucia. O escalas hacia la cima sobre los cadáveres de tus enemigos o te conviertes en un peldaño más para otra persona».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “除了生存和野心之外，真的还需要什么别的原因吗？科摩罗从不容忍弱者，只尊重强大、狡猾之人。要么踩着敌人的尸体往上爬，要么变成别人脚下的踏脚石。”
languages.original_text: "Must there be another reason beyond survival and ambition? Commorragh does not tolerate weakness. Commorragh respects only strength and cunning. Either you climb upward on the corpses of your enemies, or you become one of the steps underfoot."

traits.locale_text: “除了生存和野心之外，真的还需要什么别的原因吗？科摩罗从不容忍弱者，只尊重强大、狡猾之人。要么踩着敌人的尸体往上爬，要么变成别人脚下的踏脚石。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「生き残ることと野心以外に、理由があるだろうか？コモラフは弱き者がたまらず嫌いだ。コモラフが敬意を払うのは強さと狡猾さのみ。敵の死体を踏みつけてのし上がるか、自分がその踏み台になるかだ」
languages.original_text: "Must there be another reason beyond survival and ambition? Commorragh does not tolerate weakness. Commorragh respects only strength and cunning. Either you climb upward on the corpses of your enemies, or you become one of the steps underfoot."

traits.locale_text: 「生き残ることと野心以外に、理由があるだろうか？コモラフは弱き者がたまらず嫌いだ。コモラフが敬意を払うのは強さと狡猾さのみ。敵の死体を踏みつけてのし上がるか、自分がその踏み台になるかだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « La survie et l'ambition ne sont-elles pas des motifs suffisants ? Commorragh ne tolère pas la faiblesse. Commorragh ne respecte que la force et la ruse. Soit on en gravit les échelons en piétinant les cadavres de ses ennemis, soit on leur sert de marchepied. »
languages.original_text: "Must there be another reason beyond survival and ambition? Commorragh does not tolerate weakness. Commorragh respects only strength and cunning. Either you climb upward on the corpses of your enemies, or you become one of the steps underfoot."

traits.locale_text: « La survie et l'ambition ne sont-elles pas des motifs suffisants ? Commorragh ne tolère pas la faiblesse. Commorragh ne respecte que la force et la ruse. Soit on en gravit les échelons en piétinant les cadavres de ses ennemis, soit on leur sert de marchepied. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Muss es denn noch einen anderen Grund als Überleben und Ehrgeiz geben? Commorragh duldet keine Schwäche. Commorragh respektiert nur Stärke und List. Entweder klettert man auf den Leichen seiner Feinde nach oben, oder man wird selbst zur Stufe unter den Füßen eines anderen."
languages.original_text: "Must there be another reason beyond survival and ambition? Commorragh does not tolerate weakness. Commorragh respects only strength and cunning. Either you climb upward on the corpses of your enemies, or you become one of the steps underfoot."

traits.locale_text: "Muss es denn noch einen anderen Grund als Überleben und Ehrgeiz geben? Commorragh duldet keine Schwäche. Commorragh respektiert nur Stärke und List. Entweder klettert man auf den Leichen seiner Feinde nach oben, oder man wird selbst zur Stufe unter den Füßen eines anderen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Must there be another reason beyond survival and ambition? Commorragh does not tolerate weakness. Commorragh respects only strength and cunning. Either you climb upward on the corpses of your enemies, or you become one of the steps underfoot."

languages.text: "Hayatta kalmak ve hırstan başka neden olacak? Commorragh'da zayıflara yer yoktur. Commorragh, yalnızca güçlüye, kurnaza sahip çıkar. Ya düşmanlarının cesetlerine basa basa çıkarsın ya da kendin onlara basamak olursun."
languages.original_text: "Must there be another reason beyond survival and ambition? Commorragh does not tolerate weakness. Commorragh respects only strength and cunning. Either you climb upward on the corpses of your enemies, or you become one of the steps underfoot."

traits.locale_text: "Hayatta kalmak ve hırstan başka bir nedeni olmalı mı? Commorragh'da zayıflara yer yoktur. Commorragh yalnızca güçlüye, kurnaza sahip çıkar. Ya düşmanlarının cesetlerine basa basa çıkacaksın, ya da kendin bir basamak olacaksın."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
